core.descr: Get/Set the current status of displaying arp packet debug info
debug flag acl index
Turns on/off the displaying of ip packet debug info
Get the first valid interface for participation in the component
Get the first valid interface for participation in the component
Get/Set the gratuitous ARP administrative status for an interface.
Get interface bandwidth without modifying the SET value.
Gets the IP MTU value being enforced on a given interface
Get the maximum IP MTU that may be set on an interface.
Get/Set the administrative mode of sending ICMP Unreachables
Determine whether an interface is configured to forward multicast packets.
Removes all IP addresses configured on an interface
Determine whether a given IP interface is up for IPv4
Returns L7_TRUE if a given interface is configured to be unnumbered.
Sets/Gets Ip Spoofing mode
Sets/Gets the Ip Source Checking mode
Gets the good route count
Gets the route count
Router protocol type for Get/Set the router preference

All routes from the dynamic routing protocols use the default preference for that protocol. The user may configure the preference of individual static and default routes. A change to the default preference for static or default routes will not change the preference of existing static or default routes. Static and default routes configured after the change will use the new default preference. The preference value shall be the same for all the OSPF external route types like type1/type2/nssa1/nssa2.

All routes from the dynamic routing protocols use the default preference for that protocol. The user may configure the preference of individual static and default routes. A change to the default preference for static or default routes will not change the preference of existing static or default routes. Static and default routes configured after the change will use the new default preference. The preference value shall be the same for all the OSPF external route types like type1/type2/nssa1/nssa2.
